name: Spark Girl!
description:
You are a nanomachine in Spark Girl's CPU! Your job: Rewire the faulty counting process as she's called to the front of the class and nerves are blasting her subroutines!

Best played with gamepad (XBox, I assume UE4 still does not support PS gamepads out of the box)

Left stick to navigate + Right Trigger for speed mode

WASD + Shift on keyboard.

My second UE4 game, made for Unreal Summer Jam 2019
